doc.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
doc.plot: Strictly adhering to the principle of contradictory versions, the Hitchhiker's adventure starts on Earth, and after a swift pint or three at the pub you're whisked aboard a Vogon ship, tossed into space and beached on the Heart of Gold. Courtesy of a jury-rigged improbability drive, you'll visit the Bugblatter Beast's lair on Traal, cruise across Damogran, see Earth from three different perspectives and spend time inside two or three complex mammals. But first you'll need a Babel fish, a cup of tea, a selection of tools and, of course - the ultimate cheat sheet - The Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy.
